metadata.synopsis: Astarion and Karlach discuss Elfsong / Baldur's Mouth

3.speaker: Astarion
3.text: Probably best if I keep a low profile. They used to know me all too well in the Elfsong.
3.context: NodeContext: good natured, kinda dark humour (cause astarion's saying he could live 2 more centuries).

0.speaker: Karlach
0.text: Wonder if our paths ever crossed in the before-times. Were you always so sneaky?
0.context: NodeContext: good natured, kinda dark humour (cause astarion's saying he could live 2 more centuries).

2.speaker: Astarion
2.text: I haven't survived for two centuries by being reckless. And I hope to survive at least two more.
2.context: NodeContext: good natured, kinda dark humour (cause astarion's saying he could live 2 more centuries).

1.speaker: Karlach
1.text: Yeah yeah, don't rub it in.
1.context: NodeContext: good natured, kinda dark humour (cause astarion's saying he could live 2 more centuries).
